message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product at a special price. I think you'll really appreciate its value.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm afraid $9,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. How about $11,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not comfortable going much lower than $11,000. How about we compromise at $10,800?
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $10,200 is a fair price. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
I'm getting closer to your price, but I still think the product is worth more than $10,200. How about we meet in the middle at $10,500?
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $10,000 is a fair price. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
